title: Alien Queen
summaries: The Alien Queen is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist flying enemy that spawns in the area of the Vortex Pillar during the Lunar Events. It attacks by shooting Alien Goop projectiles that have a 1/2 (50%) / 100% chance to inflict the Distorted debuff for 6–12 / 5–9 seconds. The debuff causes the player to randomly rise and descend in wave-like motions based on their horizontal position, practically preventing them from falling downwards. It makes controlled descent impossible, but hooks and teleporting with the Rod of Discord can somewhat counteract this effect.
Upon death, it spawns a certain amount of <linked>Alien Larvae</linked>. These can quickly grow into <linked>Alien Hornets</linked> which can then grow into more Alien Queens.
